creator: drobert@bfm.bm
text:
When trying to use BXE to edit a file, one first gets a JavaScript error box
stating that there are no button definitions in the config file, then the real
error pops up: 

"Error loading config file
/lenya/default/authoring/foo.html?lenya.usecase=bxe&lenya.step=config could not
be loaded
node has no properties

Attempting to load this file directly in the browser does not work.
